EmailTemplate.name: 18-GDPR-Operational-Opt-In-Email 1.Email V1
EmailTemplate.subject: Nokia needs your consent
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> We need your consent {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}},
To comply with the new EU General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), we need to confirm that you want to keep receiving our marketing emails.
Please confirm your subscription to Nokia Networks marketing communications by clicking the button below. Thank you. Chris Thornburrow Marketing Privacy Officer Nokia Connect with us Â© {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Contact us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> This message has been sent to you because of your relationship with Nokia or its third party licensors who are trusted partners of Nokia.
